messages: 4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (17:42): dipingo: sorry, was on the phone. At work
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (17:43): good topology? what is the aim? high quality renders or real time animation?
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (17:44): I know a fair bit for low poly modelling, not much for movie quality stuff
256ca4545b4a9dd6906acaefe73e189a (17:49): hi poly stuff

42192e9b6adc8a45c267e6bfffeb4706 (17:52): hi, i'm trying to use an area lamp and i'm getting highlights that are really blown out. will increasing the number of samples on the area lamp help with this? http://treatkor.com/images/blender/blownout.jpg
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (17:52): not sample
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (17:53): Size up the Area in the Area panel
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (17:53): or decrease the Intensity
42192e9b6adc8a45c267e6bfffeb4706 (17:54): ok, i tried decreasing the intensity, i'll play with area light size.
4e034d79f6fd38d71ee4b49748485a3e (17:54): do not Size with Skey, there is Size parameter in Lamp Area panel
42192e9b6adc8a45c267e6bfffeb4706 (17:54): doh, somehow i'd set energy to 9.1
42192e9b6adc8a45c267e6bfffeb4706 (17:55): so does number of samples deal with shadows then?
42192e9b6adc8a45c267e6bfffeb4706 (17:56): affects shadows i mean.
42192e9b6adc8a45c267e6bfffeb4706 (17:56): ah ok
256ca4545b4a9dd6906acaefe73e189a (18:10): Brandano I am back you still here?
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (18:10): high poly meshes are a bit out of my field
256ca4545b4a9dd6906acaefe73e189a (18:10): I am looking for what would be considered a good topology for a human face.
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (18:11): the only things I know about high poly topology is that usually you want to keep the face size distribution pretty uniform
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (18:11): so that you don't have to deal with too much texture stretching when mapping
256ca4545b4a9dd6906acaefe73e189a (18:11): have you ever done any human faces?
256ca4545b4a9dd6906acaefe73e189a (18:12): even low
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (18:12): Yep. Very low poly stuff, though
4c7539a51b371b05ad1b3aa3af74219e (18:12): I am one of those weird guys that starts from a cube instead of a sphere for faces
256ca4545b4a9dd6906acaefe73e189a (18:12): what do you mainly do games stuff?
75146731c7b88d08017c3b32b4c91023 (18:13): I would start a head from a plane..
256ca4545b4a9dd6906acaefe73e189a (18:14): poro i think I am going to agree
256ca4545b4a9dd6906acaefe73e189a (18:14): I am learning more all the time
5b8f9b3ba8946ecdc32802b9eb4b5cdf (18:14): i start from verts and edges
ea84be53fef36c74a3bfa9f3a8047431 (18:15): timmeh: yo
ea84be53fef36c74a3bfa9f3a8047431 (18:15): timmeh: You gona be about in a bit?

ea84be53fef36c74a3bfa9f3a8047431 (18:15): timmeh: Say an hour or so?
